name: Space Engineers Mod File
summary: An SBM file is a mod file used by Space Engineers, a sandbox game used to engineer and construct spaceships to explore and survive space and planets. It is an archive that contains multiple files for modifying gameplay, such as a custom fighter cockpit, letters on a spaceship, increased speed capabilities, weapons, vehicles, signs in a spaceship, and a modified command console. SBM files are compressed with Zip compression.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
